title: Can anyone help me with this Font ID?
content:
I can't figure it out myself. I know Swiss 721 is very close!..but the G is different. Help?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018131255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_3347_3924.JPG)
author: Primehunter

comments.content:
It looks like **[Univers 85 Extra Black (Oblique)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018131255/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Univers%2085%20Extra%20Black%20-%20Oblique&fid=ce64d7a5e0d864cd97b5c2e25ca580be&fsize=60&text=DIRECTIONAL%20DRILLING&wrap=2)**

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018131255/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
